post:
Aquarius Storage is proud to announce its new website and new virtual private server line up. To celebrate this new launch, we're offering jaw dropping prices on our VPS packages. Do not let these low prices scare you away.

All new Aquarius Storage nodes feature Virtuozzo, which is a robust, secure, and tuned for performance commercial virtualization solution offered by Parallels. It is a software application for enterprise server virtualization that allows an administrator to create virtual environments on a host computer at the operating system (OS) layer

All Virtual Private Servers will be provisioned within an hour or less unless additional fraud scanning is required. Having your own Virtual Private Server will provide you with a much higher level of speed, and reliability without the price of a dedicated server. Each managed VPS is a truly unique and private environment with its own guaranteed resources and full root access.

~_~_~You may choose one coupon below~_~_~_~
Hosting Discussion Special Only: Enter Coupon: save50 (This will give you .50 cents off any VPS price on site/in thread for LIFE of the account!!!)
Hosting Discussion Special Only: Enter Coupon: moreram (This will give you 128MB of extra ram free of charge for the LIFE of the account!!!!)

All new Virtual Private Servers are now currently being provisioned in Dallas, Texas... at the SoftLayer Data Center

All VPS’s include the following:
Virtuozzo Technology
Virtuozzo Power Panel
No Setup Fees
Full Root Access (Install anything you like)
Control panel options (cPanel, DirectAdmin, Plesk, and Webmin) *
Tremendous Scalability providing upgrades on the fly.
Your choice of operating system
Equal share CPU

Aquarius Storage Sever Security
Worrying about the security of your VPS is a thing of the past. We will optimize, secure, and update your VPS before providing it to you. This is included with all packages, and is done by default unless specifically noted by the customer for us not to.

Aquarius Storage Server Monitoring
We provide proactive monitoring of your VPS for a ping response at an interval of 1 minutes. If no response is given by your VPS, we will proceed to restart it for you. This is included with all packages, and is done by default unless specifically noted by the customer for us not to.

Product Add-ons
WHMCS - 1 WHMCS License Branded ($13.95 USD Monthly + $0.00 USD Setup Fee)
ClientExec - 1 ClientExec Leased License ($8.95 USD Monthly + $0.00 USD Setup Fee)

Ping / Trace route
174.36.91.115

CentOS 5.3 is provisioned by default. We have Ubuntu, OpenSuSE, SUSE LINUX, Red Hat Enterprise 5, Fedora 9, Debian 5, and more. Contact us for more information.
